entity.name: Svelte
entity.description: Web development for the rest of us

projects.name: Svelte
projects.description: Svelte is a UI framework that uses a compiler to let you write breathtakingly concise components that do minimal work in the browser, using languages you already know — HTML, CSS and JavaScript. It’s a love letter to web development.

projects.name: SvelteKit
projects.description: SvelteKit is a framework for rapidly developing robust, performant web applications using Svelte. If you’re coming from React, SvelteKit is similar to Next. If you’re coming from Vue, SvelteKit is similar to Nuxt.

projects.name: Svelte Language Tools
projects.description: Svelte Language Tools contains a library implementing the Language Server Protocol (LSP). LSP powers the VSCode extension, which is also hosted in this repository. Additionally, LSP is capable of powering plugins for numerous other IDEs.

projects.name: Svelte CLI
projects.description: A command line interface for creating and maintaining Svelte applications

projects.name: svelte.dev
projects.description: The official Svelte website hosting the documentation, tutorials, blog, playground, and recommended packages.

projects.name: eslint-plugin-svelte
projects.description: eslint-plugin-svelte is the official ESLint plugin for Svelte. It leverages the AST generated by svelte-eslint-parser to provide custom linting for Svelte.

projects.name: svelte-eslint-parser
projects.description: The svelte-eslint-parser aims to make it easy to create your own ESLint rules for Svelte. eslint-plugin-svelte is an ESLint plugin built upon this parser, and it already implements some rules.

projects.name: Svelte MCP
projects.description: The Svelte MCP (Model Context Protocol) server can help your LLM or agent of choice write better Svelte code. It works by providing documentation relevant to the task at hand, and statically analysing generated code so that it can suggest fixes and best practices.

channels.description: Support Svelte through Open Collective with recurring or one-time contributions

plans.name: Backer
plans.description: Become a backer and support Svelte development

plans.name: Sponsor
plans.description: Become a sponsor and support Svelte development

plans.name: Custom Contribution
plans.description: Make a custom one-time or recurring contribution of any amount
